intro: Noccaea versicolor, commonly known as variable honesty, is a flowering plant in the family Brassicaceae. It is characterized by its small, yellow flowers and oval, hairy leaves. The plant typically grows in moist, calcareous soils and is often found in disturbed areas such as roadsides and fields. It is native to Europe and parts of Asia, and it is known for its ability to thrive in a variety of environmental conditions. Noccaea versicolor is an annual plant that completes its life cycle within one growing season.
